email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you be able to come down to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owner, and we can offer a revised rate of $51.00 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. We can agree to $51.00 per metric ton, provided the laycan remains 15-20 October. Please confirm the vessel’s availability and send over the draft charter party for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that. The MV Ocean Star is confirmed for the laycan of 15-20 October. I’ll send over the draft charter party by end of day today. Let me know if you need any further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. We’ll review the draft charter party as soon as it arrives. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John
